constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 169 (Tuesday, September 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PAYNE:
H.R. 5393.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 Clause 3--Congress has the ability to
regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and among the several
States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[Page H5506]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications and Technology.

title: Eliminating Local News Deserts Act of 2021
